article.title: Exact project estimation and quotation
article.description: Project budget is calculated and estimated in staff-hours. We use our own patent-pending technology for budget calculation.
article.keywords: budget, project budget, software project budget, software cost estimation, software size, estimation, estimate, project size

text.p: We calculate, communicate and define the Budget in [staff-hours](/process/cost/prices). The actual monetary size of a project is a multiple of staff-hours and price per hour.
We use our proprietary patent-pending method (USPTO patent 12/193,010) for Budget estimation and calculation.
The Budget covers all costs, including:

The Budget is paid only for [Deliverables](/process/warranty/deliverables), not for the time spent. It does not include [maintenance](/process/warranty/support}">support and other <a href="${url:process/warranty/support) services.

The Budget is calculated by the project team using Functional [Requirements](/process/scope/requirement). Each Requirement is estimated by programmers and then the total project programming effort can be calculated. Efforts for other project disciplines are calculated using the amount of hours for programming.
The Budget is changed only when changes are made to scope by [Change Requests](/process/scope/changerequest).
